categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Takit was a male Human who served as an officer in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. During the invasion of the planet Taris, he was stationed at the Toxic Lake Garrison.
Officer Takit first appeared in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic by BioWare as the Specialty Goods vendor for the Empire on Taris.
